newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Stora boosted slightly by Q1.
newsitem.headline: Stora boosted slightly by Q1.

text.p: Shares in Swedish forestry group Stora gained slightly after it reported better than expected first quarter earnings, analysts said.
The group's shares rose to a high of 105.5 crowns but was trading 2.5 crowns higher at 104.5 crowns by 1200 GMT.
It earlier said that its first quarter profit fell 54 percent to 560 million crowns, compared with market expectations of a fall to 429 million kroons.
Analysts said they were unlikely to change their forecasts for the group after the Q1 figures.
One analyst said the better than expected results meant the market would be reassured that full-year estimates would be in line with expectations.
